full_summary:
### Amendment and Tender Details

**Title:** Food Supply and Transportation Services for US-based Military Training Exercises
**Reference Number:** WS3988366378
**Solicitation Number:** WS3988366378

**Proposal Document:** This is an amendment to the tender notice for the Food (USA) Fort Knox No. W6399-24EC03 published in Ariba Discovery.

**Closing Date and Time:** 25 May 2023, 11:00 AM EDT (Eastern Daylight Time)

**Proposed Service:** The Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) requires a food supplier to provide and transport food and non-food items to various military training exercise locations in the USA.

**Areas of Service:** The service areas are those located within the USA, where the CAF conducts military training exercises for periods of up to two months.

**Eligibility:** This solicitation is restricted to suppliers who hold an active standing offer (Supply Arrangement) under # W6399-23DB05. Potential bidders who do not hold this standing offer may still submit a bid to qualify for the arrangement.

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) - Demande de propositions (DP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering (Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif)

**Notice Language:** English, French

### Additional Information

* The Canadian Armed Forces is seeking proposals for a Supply Arrangement (no. W6399-23DB05) including Access to various Canadian and US supplied food vendors for military training exercises in the US.
* Interested Suppliers, must have the capability and capacity to meet this requirement and must have an existing CASPer ID (Supplier identification).
* Canada will not extend the RFP Food (USA) Fort Knox #W6399-24EC03 under the Information Systems Contract (ISC) to Provide Additional Time for Bidders to submit a proposal for this RFP.

### Contact Information

* Ministerity of National Defence (MDN), Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada.
* Contact: Malko-Moore, Shamael (TPSGC-PSPC) - email: [shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

This rewritten text includes all the necessary information and rephrases the text into a clearer and more professional format. The text was
